mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tablet above the door of 46 East Lawn, commemorating the founding of Kappa Sigma Fraternity,
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inscription: Here on December the tenth MDCCCLXIX [1869] the Kappa Sigma Fraternity was founded by William Grigsby McCormick -- George Miles Arnold -- John Covert Boyd -- Edmund Law Rogers -- Frank Courtney Nicodemus -- manet mansur aque est. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
memorials
plaques (flat objects)
dormitories (rooms)
fraternities
Kappa Sigma Fraternity
